definition: lit. by the thousands and tens of thousands (idiom); untold numbers/innumerable/thousands upon thousands
money isn't everything, but without money you can do nothing (idiom)
pinyin: qian2 bu4 shi4 wan4 neng2 de5 , mei2 qian2 shi4 wan4 wan4 bu4 neng2 de5
containing_words.word: 錢不是萬能的，沒錢是萬萬不能的

sentences.english: You don't see that every day.
sentences.chinese: 你萬萬不可每天看到它。

sentences.english: The concept of failure in meditation is profoundly disempowering.
sentences.chinese: 在冥想中“失敗”這個概念是萬萬不可去碰的。

sentences.english: But sister, you remember, friends, is absolutely not have the heart of the utilitarian.
sentences.chinese: 但是妹妹，你記住，交友是萬萬不能有功利之心的。

sentences.english: Singapore cannot afford to bear the label of "the third China".
sentences.chinese: “第三中國”這頂大帽，我們萬萬擔當不起。

sentences.english: Many spurious claims are made and millions are lost annually on bogus news.
sentences.chinese: 許多僞稱是由千千萬萬的人正在失去每年假消息。
當然那是萬萬不可能的。

sentences.english: Under no circumstances should you eat the vegetables, as they contain dangerous amounts of butt-blasting fibre.
sentences.chinese: 萬萬別喫，因爲內含的有毒纖維份量足以造成肛裂。

sentences.english: The problem of rising sea level is a potential threat for agriculture which is not to be neglected.
sentences.chinese: 海平面上升的潛在威脅，萬萬不可小視。

sentences.english: The price of liberty is eternal vigilance.
sentences.chinese: 警惕性是萬萬不可放鬆的。

sentences.english: Door model again small, also absolutely cannot lack toilet.
sentences.chinese: 戶型再小，衛生間也是萬萬不能缺少的。

sentences.english: Munsell Color spectrum is an absolute color reference system.
sentences.chinese: 孟塞爾色譜是一個萬萬色彩參照編制。

sentences.english: Of course, conventional wisdom says it's a no-no.
sentences.chinese: 當然，傳統觀念認爲這是萬萬不可的。

sentences.english: Absolutely cannot think of, lin Manli falls in pool of blood.
sentences.chinese: 萬萬沒想到，林曼莉倒在血泊中。

sentences.english: Don't offend her. She always smites with the tongue.
sentences.chinese: 萬萬別獲咎她，她經常血口噴人。

sentences.english: In such an exigence my uncle's advice and assistance would be every thing in the world;
sentences.chinese: 情況如此緊急，萬萬非請舅父前來協助指示不可。

sentences.english: This idea never occurred to me.

definition: whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
preferably/one would prefer to...(or not to...)/would rather/(would) be better to/(to pick) the lesser of two evils
just in case/if by any chance/contingency
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if
a period of time/a while/for a short while/temporary/momentary/at the same time
in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
in the end/after all is said and done
